name: Pawsome Space Barge
description:
Accompanied by your sister, can you Captain Catnip overcome adversity in this relaxing yet at times intense space tug saga?

Cats, Asteroids, Orbital Mechanics, and some catnip mafia too.

*** Note:   WebGL build has known performance issues not present in the platform builds available for Win64/MacOS/Linux. Consider the WebGL build a work in progress.   ***

Your task should you choose to accept it is to maneuver a barge across an asteroid field for delivery. However the barge is in orbit and rather heavy, so your task is two fold:

  1. Push the barge to alter it's trajectory.
  2. Clear asteroids from the barge's path.

Accompanied by your sister Kitty Purry, use your wits to overcome physics and foes to make a name for yourself in the Caturn rings shipping industry!

Supports keyboard and gamepad controllers. Multiplayer is supported but currently incomplete.

We would like to collect user feedback, and if you are willing we would love to hear your thoughts. To this end I have a simple feedback form that can be filled out in a few minutes time:

https://forms.gle/VDeiztHc3mArzCZTA
